Novo ime na listi kandidata – Maks Alegri umesto Kovača
Aktuelni trener Bajerna ima samo dve utakmice fore da sačuva posao

03 Nov 2019

Poverenje Niku Kovaču oročeno je na naredne dve utakmice. U sredu u Minhen stiže Olimpijakos u Ligi šampiona, u subotu je na Alijanc areni derbi jeseni protiv dortmunske Borusije, na obe utakmice sedeće hrvatski stručnjak na klupi bavarskog giganta, ali ukoliko nastavi rezultatsko posrtanje izvesno će biti smenjen.
Sve manje ljudi u vrhu kluba veruje u Kovača, a da mu se uveliko sprema naslednik postaje jasno na osnovu informacija Korijere delo sporta. Rimski dnevnik uverava da je prvi kandidat da zameni 48-godišnjeg stručnjaka – Masimilijano Alegri.
Od svih slobodnih trenera na evropskom tržištu, Maks je uz Žozea Murinja, natraženiji i po Italiji je već počelo da se priča kako bi njegova naredna destinacija mogao da bude baš Minhen. Ruku na srce, pisalo se kao u Bajernu postoje tri struje, samim tim isto toliko kandidata (Maurisio Poketino, Erik ten Hag i Ralf Rangnik), ali je posle debakla u Frankfurtu (1:5) sve češće se pominje da je Alegri kao favorit. Zasad nema informacija da li bi nekadašnji strateg Juventusa prihvatio ponudu, s obzirom da nije selektirao ekipu, ali kako treneri vole da kažu „u ovom poslu koferi su uvek spremni“, tako da ne bi trebalo isključiti tu opciju.
Možda je predstojeća reprezentativna pauza, upravo poslel derbija sa Borusijom, šansa za promene, jer je evidentno da Bajern ne igra prema očekivanjima i da mu je šok-terapija neophodna. Ako neko zna kako se osvajaju trofeji onda je to Maks Alegri, jer je bio prvak sa Milanom, a na klupi Juventusa osvojio je šest uzastopnih Skudeta i četiri trofeja Kupa Italije.

New name on the list of candidates - Max Alegri instead of Kovac
The current coach of Bayern has only two fore games to save his job

03 Nov 2019

Nick Kovac's confidence is forged in the next two games. On Wednesday, the Olympiakos in the Champions League arrives in Munich, on Saturday at the Alliance Arena in the autumn derby against Dortmund Borussia, the Croatian expert will sit on the bench of the Bavarian giant in both games, but if he continues the resultant stumbling will surely be replaced.
Fewer and fewer people at the top of the club believe in Kovacs, and that his successor is in great shape is becoming clear from Corrie's information the work of the sport. The Roman daily assures that the first candidate to replace the 48-year-old expert - Masimiliano Alegri.
Of all the free coaches on the European market, Max is already, with Jose Mourinho, more demanding and Italy has already started talking about how his next destination could be Munich. Hand to heart, it was said that there were three streams in Bayern, with the same number of candidates (Maurisio Poketino, Erik ten The Hague and Ralf Rangnik), but it is increasingly mentioned after the Frankfurt debacle (1: 5) that Alegri is favored . So far, there is no information on whether the former Juventus strategist would accept the offer, since he did not select the team, but as coaches like to say "in this business suitcases are always ready", so this option should not be ruled out.
Perhaps the upcoming national team break, having just sent a derby with Borussia, is a chance for change, as it is evident that Bayern are not playing as expected and that shock therapy is necessary. If anyone knows how to win trophies then it's Max Alegri, because he was champion with Milan, and on the Juventus bench he won six consecutive Skudets and four Italian Cup trophies.
